description: Table definitions for the generic schema. These tables can be used for any protocol.

tables.label: Incentive Claim Data
tables.description: Transactional data on user level incentives claimed data.

claimedTokenAddress.description: The smart contract address of the claimed token.

claimedTokenAmount.description: The amount of the token claimed, decimal normalized.

claimedTokenUsd.description: The amount of claimed tokens in USD.

otherIncentiveUsd.description: Any incentives outside of the claimed token, in this transaction, summed up in USD terms.

airdropTimestamp.description: The timestmap the airdrop was given to the user.

userAddress.description: The address of the user claiming the airdrop.

claimTimestamp.description: The timestamp of when the user claimed the airdrop.

airdropTokenAddress.description: The smart contract address of the airdropped token.

airdropTokenSymbol.description: The symbol of the token being airdropped

tokenAmounts.description: The amount of each token airdropped, decimal normalized.

amountUsd.description: The USD value of the airdropped tokens.

firstOutgoingTransactionAddress.description: The address of the first receiver of airdropped tokens.

firstOutgoingTransactionTimestamp.description: The timestamp of the first outgoing transaction.

firstOutgoingTransactionAmount.description: The amount of the first outgoing transaction, decimal normalized.

methodId.description: The method ID of the airdrop.

tables.label: Protocol Snapshot
tables.description: Protocol level snapshot focused on incentives and users.

dailyActiveUsers.description: The number of unique daily active users on this protocol.

transactionCount.description: The number of transactions in this time period.

transactionFees.description: The amount of fees in this given period, decimal normalized.

incentiveAmount.description: The amount of incentives given out over the snapshot period, decimal normalized.

incentiveUsd.description: The value of incentives in USD.

tokenAddress.description: The smart contract address of the token.

tokenAmount.description: The amount of the token, decimal normalized.

tokenAmountUsd.description: The USD value of the token.

tables.label: Pool Snapshot
tables.description: APR and APY data at the pool level.

protocolType.description: The type of protocol (ie, Lending, CDP, DEX, Gaming, etc).

poolAddress.description: The smart contract address of the pool.

poolName.description: The name of the pool (ie, pool() in the smart contract, if it exists).

tvlUsd.description: The total value locked within this pool in USD.

return30d.description: The return of this pool over 30 days.

apr.description: The annual percentage rate of this pool at the snapshot.

apy.description: The annual percentage yield of the pool.

tables.label: User Transaction Snapshot
tables.description: Transaction and gas fees data at the user level.

transactionCount.description: Number of transactions during this snapshot period from the user.

transactionFees.description: The amount of fees in this given period, decimal normalized.
